version_description:
FART FOR FREE IS BACK!

2.0 Features:
- Brand new redesign
- Record farts and send them to your friends!
- Timer feature
- iOS 7 compatible
- Four extra farts
As requested in the reviews, Fart 19 and 20 have been replaced with Fart 1 and 3 from the old version of the App

Fart World: Where your fart dreams become reality

- All new premium farts page with 20 new farts
- All new social page where you can send farts to friends
- Mute button issue is fixed
- No longer need to keep phone unlocked in timer mode

Enjoy and fart away

iPad Compatible!

------

Fart World (previously Fart For Free) is the one and only fart soundboard you need. It's got a ton of beautiful, lovely farts and it is absolutely free. With high quality, beautiful fart sounds, you can do many things:

- Play pranks on your friends
- Disgust your girlfriend
- Entertain your little brother
- Reminisce on past farts

Do whatever you want with it, but remember, these farts are not yours, they belong to the makers, and will forever be entitled to them.

- New in-app premium purchase
- Bug fixes
- Reduced required iOS back to iOS 11
- Fixes black screen issue for iOS 12 users and below
Bug fixes

- The timer is more easily readable.
- Have any suggestions for features? Email GabeJacobs824@gmail.com with the subject "FEEDBACK"

- New Tab! MAKE IT RAIN!
- Have any suggestions for features? Email GabeJacobs824@gmail.com with the subject "FEEDBACK"
bug fixes
- new website
- bug fixes

- Updated text
- App store movie
- added localization
- localized keywords
- push notifications
- bug fixes
- fixes crash and layout issues on some phones

Ladies and Gentleman, the fart app you have all been waiting for...

************ 3.0 IS HERE ************

This is the biggest update in the 11 year history of Fart World. If you thought the only thing to do with farts was play them, you thought wrong. Introducing...

- THE CREATE PAGE: Use your device's camera to capture a video. Then edit in realistic fart sounds. Choose intensity 1 for a quickie, intensity 3 for a biggie. Share and enjoy!
- THE FARTAPHONE: In the microphone goes words, out the microphone comes farts. Enough said.

Buying premium gives your access to premium farts, gets rid of all full-screen ads, gives you unlimited creates, and gets rid of the watermark on the create videos. Good deal if you ask me!

P.S. If you're still reading this, you've discovered the secret. Double-tap the fart logo and you'll find the manifesto.

THANK YOU FOR USING FART WORLD 3.0! IF YOU LOVE IT, REVIEW US! HAVING A PROBLEM, LET US KNOW!

- Added the ability to use personal videos in the create tab
- Reordered the features on the tab bar
- Added in-app reviewing
- reorder of buttons on create page
better localization
- Fixed issue with sharing videos on iPads running iOS 13+
- minor bug fixes

- Fixed crashed when using videos with no sound
- Added 5 new make it rains!

- UI fixes
- New premium features
- removed banners for premium users
-  bug fixes
